header_text: You were asked to plan a fundraiser for a local non-profit, a task you've taken on yearly. While organizing the details, you become upset because you notice it is taking you much longer than in the past. You choose to write down a plan, delegate tasks to others, and watch the event come together successfully.

elements.Text: Are you still able to plan the fundraising event?
